Subject: ROLL CALL To: Gregory Morris <gmorris@andrew.cmu.edu>    Office of the Recruitment Specialist,Student Services,Carnegie Mellon University Services, urgently requires a Research Assistant for a Remote Position to earn $300 weekly. The Student Services Recruitment Specialist,Stefan Bernhard  is currently working on Research and would require the services of Students (Graduate/Undergraduate) of any Department of the Institution to Obtain a Remote Position in this Research. Slots are limited and acceptance will be given on a first come first serve basis.

To proceed with the application process, contact Stefan Bernhard  via email at {berhs34@gmail.com <berhs34@gmail.com>} using your alternate email stating your full name, email address, year of study, and department regarding the job description and further application requirements.Prof Stefan BernhardThe Student Services Recruitment Specialist,Carnegie Mellon University Pittsburgh, PA

Subject: CMU Intern Opportunity at The Department of History To: Gregory Morris<gmorris@andrew.cmu.edu>  Students at Carnegie Mellon University!  The Department of History has some fantastic internship opportunities available, and the department welcomes applications from all majors. This opportunity is designed to provide financial assistance to students who might be facing some financial challenges, while also giving them the chance to gain some invaluable research experience.  These internships are completely remote! That means you can work from the comfort of your own home or even on-campus if you prefer.

The time commitment is pretty chill too, with a maximum requirement of just seven hours a week. Plus, the schedules are super flexible, so you can easily fit them around your other commitments.  If you're chosen for one of these internships, you will receive a weekly salary of Three Hundred and Fifty dollars  If this sounds like an opportunity you don't want to miss, all you need to do is reach out to Professor Jay Aronson at aronsonjjay@gmail.com [mailto:aronsonjjay@gmail.com] with your full Names, year of study, department, school email address and alternative email address (preferably Gmail) for details about the job description and any additional application requirements.

Subject: Good360 Part-Time Job Offer To: gmorris@andrew.cmu.edu Good360 is seeking individuals to help expand their charity network across the country. They're looking for passionate individuals to join their team as Community Care Workers.  This part-time, work-from-home job offers a competitive weekly salary of $550.

If you're interested in making a difference and joining their team alongside 1.5 million volunteers and 6.8 million donors, Kindly send your resume/application using your frequently personal email for regular communication.  Community Outreach Team Good360

Subject: JOB OFFER - HIRING NCSU STUDENTS NOW Hello student,   I'm glad to inform you Nagina Cotton Mills Limited is currently running a part time job opportunity program that helps hard working and reliable student like you qualify for an avenue to earn more income within few hours and once a week.   Weekly Payment: $550 weekly. READ CAREFULLY: This program does not hinder you from doing others job but as a student it helps to build your financial status.

Job Title:- Middlemen Job Type:- Part Time Weekly Payment:- $550 Required hours:- 2 hours/weekly   Responsibilities:- Your task for the company will basically be on helping the supplier to keep record of materials he or she bought for the week.You will be getting paid every Friday of the week; we shall Email you a paycheck to cover your weekly payment and also includes money for you to pay the supplier so he or she can start working on materials that will be supplied.     The supplier will only order for materials weekly between Mondays and Saturdays depending on the task he/she is to complete for that week. You are to carry out your own job task as assigned to you and this may require 2-hours in a day and once in a week.

No prior experience is necessary because we would give you instructions and guidelines on how to carry out your job task perfectly and effectively. Your own part of the work can be completed at your leisure time in school or at home. But, we do not encourage delay.

You have to keep to the instructions and guidelines so as to get your part of the job done effectively. If you wish to proceed with the job, get back to us with your valid information     Requirements:     FULL NAME PHYSICAL CONTACT ADDRESS or P.O BOX CITY STATE ZIP CODE D.O.B GENDER PHONE NUMBER PERSONAL EMAIL CURRENT JOB.   We shall contact you as soon as we receive and validate the information you provide.

Subject: REMOTE INTERN Dear Undergraduate and Graduate Students,  The Department of Research and Development at NC State University is pleased to announce a remote internship opportunity available through the office of the Interim Provost and Executive Vice Chancellor for all interested and qualified students. We encourage you to apply and gain valuable experience in your desired field.  Position: Remote Intern Department: All Departments  Qualifications: - Currently enrolled as an undergraduate or graduate student at NC State University.

- Maintain regular communication through online platforms and actively participate in virtual meetings.  Compensation:  Selected interns will be eligible for a weekly stipend of $350 to acknowledge their dedication and commitment. The stipend will be disbursed at the end of each week.

Upon selection, applicants will receive a notification email and must attend an online orientation session before commencing their work. We welcome applications from students of all fields, nationalities, and citizenship statuses.  How to Apply:  To apply, kindly send an email to Warwick A.

If this proposal is acceptable to you,indicate your interest by sending a email to us including your bank name & address, account number,telephone number.  Note that the particular nature of your company's business is irrelevant to this transaction. if this transaction interests you, your urgent response will be appreciated.
